beanTypes.name: Arabica (Standard)
beanTypes.description: Smooth, sweet, fruity notes – the classic choice

beanTypes.name: Robusta
beanTypes.description: Bold, earthy, higher caffeine for a strong kick

beanTypes.name: Liberica
beanTypes.description: Floral, woody, smoky – rare and unique

beanTypes.name: Bourbon
beanTypes.description: Sweet, balanced, caramel and chocolate notes

beanTypes.name: Yellow Bourbon
beanTypes.description: Brighter acidity, honey and citrus – rare yellow cherries

beanTypes.name: Caturra
beanTypes.description: Bright acidity, citrus and floral – compact plant

beanTypes.name: Catuai
beanTypes.description: Balanced, nutty, good body – hybrid strength

beanTypes.name: Pacamara
beanTypes.description: Huge beans, floral, berry explosion – rare giant

beanTypes.name: SL28
beanTypes.description: Kenyan legend – blackcurrant, tomato, bright acidity

beanTypes.name: Ethiopian Heirloom Blend
beanTypes.description: Wild mix of thousands of ancient varieties – blueberry, floral magic
